citances.sentence: It has been said of the equivalent Federal Court Rule (Order 33 Rule 12) that a Notice to Produce has the same coercive effect as a subpoena duces tecum: Seven Network Ltd v News Ltd (No 5) ; [2005] FCA 510 ; (2005) 216 ALR 147 at [6] ; Re Ox Operations Pty Ltd [2008] FCA 61 at [42] . Therefore the document, even if perceived to be irrelevant or otherwise objectionable, cannot safely be ignored.
